title.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR
title.text: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR
title.html: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR

tagline.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND VISIT KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.text: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND VISIT KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.html: BALI SAFARI PARK AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND VISIT KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO

description.text: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to Visit Bali Safari and Marine Park and then see the amazing view of mount batur volcano and lake from kintamani village and visit tegalalang rice terrace. This combination of Bali Safari Marine Park and Sightseing Tour to visit Kintamani village with view of mount batur volcano and lake. First trip is visit Bali Safari and Marine Park for do Jungle Hopper Packages, enjoy for encounter amazing animal in the park and see the animal show that will complete your journey in this park, and then we will having lunch Indonesian food, after lunch we continue the tour for visit kintamani village at penelokan for see the beautiful view of mount batur volcano from distance, after that we visiting the amazing tegalalang rice terrace, and then we go back to your hotel with bring awesome memory featured in this combination of Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour. Below is short description of the tour.

title.title: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages
title.text: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages
title.html: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour | Bali Safari and Marine Park | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Safari and Marine Park features the following exhibits featuring wide range of animal species and some of the fascinating creatures that can be seen at the Bali Safari and Marine Park. Fulfilling its mission of conservation, education and recreation. The Safari Park of Jungle Hopper Packages offers an unforgettable tour and education experience among the more than 100 species of animals housed at the recreational park and active wildlife conservation center at Bali Safari Marine Park. Book this Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour and enjoy explore the biggest bali safari and see many kind of animal and bird, totally full of fun during your holiday

title.title: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View | Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour | Bali Golden Tour
title.text: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View
title.html: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour | Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of countryside located in the hill and the beautiful panorama surround it. We can see beautiful panorama from Kintamani Village to overview the active volcano of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. It is situated in the plateau area with cool weather surround it. When we stand up at Kintamani, we will be able to see the rural area which is close to the lake. Kintamani is the object of mountain tourism is very unique and stunning, with cool air condition in the daytime and cold at night. We can watch stunning natural scenery of Penelokan, a combination of Mount Batur and the expanse of black rock with Lake Batur and on a blue caldera.
description.html: Kintamani Village is a name of countryside located in the hill and the beautiful panorama surround it. title.title: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour | Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour | Ubud Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is famous tourist attraction for beautiful rice terraces, many tourists who travel to Ubud stopped at this place to witness the beauty of the verdant terraced rice field scenery or having lunch at the restaurant while enjoying the beautiful scenery of terraced rice fields. Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is one of the tourist icon in Ubud Bali. The Ubud rice terrace is designed very beautiful with exquisite hollowing rice field and precisely located on the hill bank. In this place, you will see the Balinese farmer do their rice field in oblique area complete with its system irrigation.

price.title: Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour Price :

Adult

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,350,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,075,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 875,000/person

Children (3 - 12 years) :

  • 1 Child : IDR 775,000/person
  • 2 Child : IDR 750,000/person

Toodler (0 - 2 years) : Free of charge

Note : Get Special Price For Group Booking

Bali Safari Park and Kintamani Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Bali Safari and Marine Park – Jungle Hopper Package
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Petrol
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Mineral Water

Visit Kintamani Village with View Volcano

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
